main_topic.author: G R Shanker Sai
main_topic.title: Disabled due to competitions active submission limit.
main_topic.content:
Hi,

I have made 4 submissions, the latest one is performing the best, the second best performing agent is the first one which i submitted. but the first one has stopped playing games because it says "Disabled due to competitions active submission limit." how can i make sure that  the agent which i submitted first is still in the competition?

comments.author: OminousDude
comments.content: You can only have 3 submissions at a time
comments.date: Posted 24 days ago  ·  503rd in this Competition

comments.author: Junhua Yang
comments.date: Posted 24 days ago  ·  490th in this Competition
